name: Shape Formation Reborn
description:
Welcome to shape formation, a bullet hell rhythm game in which you dodge obstacles. That's basically it.

There are 6 difficulties

XOOOOO - Easy

XXOOOO - Normal

XXXOOO - Hard

XXXXOO - Very Hard

XXXXXO - Extreme

XXXXXX - Impossible

HOW TO PLAY

left and right arrow keys or A and D to move.
